alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Prowers, Baca, southeastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of John Martin Reservoir to 13 miles northwest of Kenton. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Prowers, Baca, southeastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties, including the following locations... Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
